reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Modest it may be but I cannot fault the helpfulness and generosity of the owner. She went over and above what I would have expected to make us feel welcome. San Sebastián is an expensive place to stay but, unlike most of the places we have stayed in Spain and France, this small, simple hotel does not charge for parking. If you want 5 star luxury, this is not for you. If you want a simple, clean and comfortable room I can highly recommend it
reviews.title: A little gem

reviews.text: Firstly the service at Hotel Record was really, really good. The room we got was ok and overall the price was quite fair, considering San Seb is expensive.
reviews.title: Really good, but not too central.

reviews.text: It's a very clean hotel as well.
reviews.title: a very friendly small reasonably priced family Hotel 5 mins from the sea m

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only downside is that it's 15-20min walk to Old Town - but hey, if your up for the walk, then it's fantastic.
reviews.title: What a breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We drove to San Sebastian for our son's wedding and stayed 2 nights at the Record with 4 other couples all of us really enjoyed this clean friendly Hotel. The staff are very helpful and are keen to help with what to do places to eat and buses etc. There was always plenty of hot water, breakfast good too. The free parking was a great bonus. We will definitely stay at the Record again next ,m b
reviews.title: Great location good hotel
Great find
reviews.text: Lovely little hotel. Close to the beach (5 min to the nearest one), 10 min walk into the old part of town (the walk takes you past the sea front so as walks goes it pretty nice) and friendly staff who go out of their way to help.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is definitely worth the price and again staff are super.
reviews.title: Good little budget guest house

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are clean and spacious and we had a lovely balcony to spend the evening in.
reviews.title: Would go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our last stop of our 2 week European driving holiday before getting the ferry from Santander to sunny England! I wouldn’t normally stay 2* but I was put off by the ridiculous car parking charges that hotels in San Sebastian charge! As it turned out this place fine for our one night stay and we really liked San Sebastian.
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived slightly early but allowed to check in. Parking was easy. We had a ground floor room which was basic but fine. As others have said the soundproofing is rubbish but this didn’t really affect us too much. The wifi was free which was a bonus and the shower was excellent. Breakfast was good value at 4 euros.
reviews.title: good budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very helpful staff and a great location but getting a bit tired and the room design makes them crowded and difficult to get around. we had unwittingly booked into San Sebastian/Donastia at the same time as one of its major Bacchinalian festivals. We were very glad to be at Hotel Record across the river from the Parte Veijas where all the action appeared to be. It is in a relatively quiet neighbourhood and the city (and beaches) are easily accessable by foot or public transport.
reviews.title: Great location, helpful service, a bit of a squeeze

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a really well run budget hotel, as other reviewers have noted the staff and owners are very friendly and helpful. We received a much more personal service than we would normally get in larger and grander establishments.
reviews.title: 2 Star hotel - 5 Star service

reviews.text: The breakfast were good, much better than the those we have had in similar hotels in France, and quite reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Great stay during festival time

reviews.text: The only negative comment we would make is that our bathroom, and in particular the bath, in room 105 really needs updating, however we thoroughly recommend the Hotel Record and we would certainly stat there again.
reviews.title: Home from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Conveniently located near the surfing beach and a 10-15 minute walk to the old town along the beach.
reviews.title: Very pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot speak highly enough of the hotel and the staff. From the moment we arrived we were treated superbly. We had a room on the first floor, it was spacious and extremely clean, the breakfast was brilliant . The staff on reception and at breakfast were brilliant and most informative as to the city with regards to places to visit and where to eat. Ontop of this there was ample room to park and for no extra charge which for a city hotel is very rare. I must apologise for the late review as we visited way back in April 2012. We will definitely return, many thanks from Gordon and Diana.
reviews.title: FABULOUS CITY HOTEL
Great Hotel!!!
reviews.text: The lovely staff at Record Hotel made our first visit (and not last!) to Sans Sebastian one to remember. The staff could not help us more and wanted to ensure that we really had the type of stay we wanted. The rooms were simple, spotless and large with little balconies, very good value for money. The location is deceptively close to a beautiful beach, shops and little hole in the wall cafes. We would stay at this hotel again without a second thought. Highly recommend the hotel!!!

The hotel was extremely clean, the staff was very nice, always trying to help. The location of the hotel was excellent, 4 minutes to the beach of gros and 10 or so to la playa de la Concha. You have nice stores by the hotel as well as restaurants bars and supermarkets. Very close to the old town as well maybe 15 minutes walking or so.
reviews.title: Fantastic!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well we've had 2 nights at the Hotel Record in San Sebastian. So the real benefits happen before you even get to your room.
reviews.title: Couldnt be more helpful...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lady behind the desk could not do more for you, she allowed us to park the car 4 hours before check in.. allowed us to check in 2 hours before we were sposed to, and offered to look after our stuff before we were due to check in.
reviews.title: Great value, clean, and friendly staff
